description: With over 2.5 years of dedicated experience as a Software Engineer, my role at eQ has revolved around enterprise application development. During this tenure, I was pivotal in spearheading the development of critical backend components essential for data model creation across all the eQube products, where I embraced the challenges in full-stack development.

With active inter-team collaborations, I actively devised solutions for various business problems with multiple use cases. Throughout my journey at eQ, I've remained committed to continuous learning and improvement, always striving to deliver excellence in everything I do.
